Demo - API Orchestration

@getpostman

Request

Create New API

Make API call to AWS API gateway with the details of the API to be created, publishig a single API to Amazon wit an API collection.

Request

Create Models

Make API call to AWS API gateway with the details of the API model, defining the underlying schema for the API.

Request

Create Resource

Create a single resource, establishing the first path of the API, setting what API consumers will be calling with eqch request.

Request

Create Table

Switch AWS API to create a table with DynamoDB, providing the backend data storage for the API being deployed to AWS API Gateway.

Request

Define Integration

Back to using the AWS API Gateway API to make an API request to define the integration between AWS API Gateway and AWS DynamoDB.

Request

Define Integration Response

Define the response that will be returned with the API call, providing the details of what will be returned, as well as each HTTP status code.

Request

Define API Keys

Make an API call to create API keys that can be used by consumer to call the API being deployed, securing the resource.

Request

Define Usage Plans

Create usage plans that define how much of the resource can be consume, setting limits for what can be consumed.

Request

Deploy API

Now the API is ready for deployment into any pre-defined stage, publishing it to development, production, or other stage.

Base URL

Update Environment

Update the base URL for the API we have deployed, allowing us to make calls to the API, and see a response.

Request

Make Request

Now we can call our new API and see a response, pulling data from DynamoDB, and making vailable via the new API.

Publish

Publish Documentation

Now we can publish documentation for the new API, automatically generating API documentation that can be used by consumers.

View Documentation

View the API documentation that has been generated from the Postman collection, making it easy for consumers to on-board.

Request

Create Monitor

Add a new monitor for keeping track of the availability and quality of the API deployed using the AWS API Gateway.

View Monitor Results

See the results of the API monitor, staying in tune with the availablity of the API published, completing the delivery of the API.
